commands.name: echo
commands.helptext: Usage: /echo Text you wish to repeat.
commands.description: Repeats whatever chat data is sent to the bot. Useful for testing the bot connection.

commands.name: translate
commands.description: Uses Google Translate to translate the search word or phrase.

commands.name: quote
commands.description: Pulls the most recent open and close prices for the specified ticker symbol from Alpha Vantage.

commands.name: spam
commands.description: Sends test messages to the room in which it is called.

commands.name: gif
commands.description: Summons a GIF from the OtherLands for your amusement. If search text is blank this command will return a random GIF.

commands.name: feedbackhelp
commands.description: Helpception - this command displays the help message for client feedback submissions.
